title: Ring mail
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Ring mail     |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | Small, Medium |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 5             |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | 7             |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +5            |
| Grants                                                         | nothing       |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5             |

|   |                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A light leather suit reinforced with a covering of metal rings. It is protective in combat, but slightly uncomfortable due to the added weight. |

**Ring mail** is a body [armour](/Armour "Armour") one step heavier than [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour").

## Desirability

Ring mail can be a decent armour for hybrid and/or [EV](/EV "EV")-based characters. It strikes a balance between not interfering with EV/spells too much, and providing some protection. Casters with low strength may prefer a lighter armour to decrease spell failure, while a strong melee brute will definitely prefer a heavier one.

Unless you find a particularly good ring mail, you'll want to upgrade to [swamp dragon scales](/Swamp_dragon_scales "Swamp dragon scales"), which offers more AC for the same encumbrance. Or [steam dragon scales](/Steam_dragon_scales "Steam dragon scales"), which offers the same AC but with 0 encumbrance.

## Trivia

[Ring mail](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ring_mail) is an item of armour whose historical existence is somewhat doubtful. It seems more likely that it is a Victorian misinterpretation of contemporary depictions of chain mail or scale mail, or that the rings were merely items of decoration.

html:
Ring mail

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Ring mail
Size to wear Small, Medium
Armour Class 5
Encumbrance rating 7
Maximum Enchantment +5
Grants nothing
Time to Wear 5


A light leather suit reinforced with a covering of metal rings. It is protective in combat, but slightly uncomfortable due to the added weight.

Ring mail is a body armour one step heavier than leather armour.

Desirability

Ring mail can be a decent armour for hybrid and/or EV-based characters. It strikes a balance between not interfering with EV/spells too much, and providing some protection. Casters with low strength may prefer a lighter armour to decrease spell failure, while a strong melee brute will definitely prefer a heavier one.

Unless you find a particularly good ring mail, you'll want to upgrade to swamp dragon scales, which offers more AC for the same encumbrance. Or steam dragon scales, which offers the same AC but with 0 encumbrance.

Trivia

Ring mail is an item of armour whose historical existence is somewhat doubtful. It seems more likely that it is a Victorian misinterpretation of contemporary depictions of chain mail or scale mail, or that the rings were merely items of decoration.
